snippet.title: The Survivalists Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
The Survivalists is coming to Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC on October 9th 2020! The Survivalists is also Coming Soon to Apple Arcade.

The Survivalists is a survival game set in The Escapists universe where you've been shipwrecked on a desert island and must craft, build, explore, sail and befriend monkeys to thrive! Play online with up to 3 friends co-op or play solo - you'll still have monkey pals! 

Pre-order now on:
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/the-survivalists-switch/
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/897450/The_Survivalists/
Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/p/the-survivalists-pre-order/9NLRR09VL85S

Pre-order and gain the Monkey Business DLC for free with 6 monkey hats and 3 player hats which are all included in a small side quest.

The Survivalists Digital Deluxe extra bonuses are also exclusively available on Steam! Including art book, OST and 3 day early access to the final beta, 3 days prior to launch. 

We have also opened a brand new Discord server to talk island life and interact with the developers! Join now: https://discord.gg/Fn3bJSF

Game Page: https://www.team17.com/games/the-survivalists
Follow The Survivalists on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SurvivalistsT17
Like The Survivalists on Facebook: https://facebook.com/SurvivalistsT17

Follow Team17 on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Team17Ltd
Like Team17 on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17/

About Team17 Digital Ltd
Founded in 1990, Team17 Digital Limited is a leading international games label that hosts the Worms franchise, Blasphemous, The Escapists, Moving Out, Overcooked, Neon Abyss, Yoku’s Island Express, Yooka-Laylee and many more from developers around the world. Visit www.team17.com for more info. 

Newsletter: bit.ly/SubTeam17
